<b>Introduction within Rugby Helps Officials</b>
<br>Rugby introduced goal-line technology in 2001. <b><a href=www.thegioilich.net>in lịch tết[/url]</b> Referees can call on the video official, known as the "television match official" or TMO, to consult on decisions relating to the scoring of a try or a kick at goal.
